ygData.subject: Re: Re: Medium Bronze Armor - SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: I went to the saturday night bazaar and was shocked at the prices people were paying for bronze!  I had actually outfitted a good amount of my own bronze from
ygData.messageBody:
I went to the saturday night bazaar and was shocked at the prices people
were paying for bronze! I had actually outfitted a good amount of my own
bronze from High Hold NPCs, and paid less than the poor schmos at the
bazaar! Best check the NPCs around the area, you just may pay less than
from PCs. (The NPCs perhaps truely understand the value of bonze, it's
junk...)

Roop


>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>Yes Sol B is extremly good for Medium Bronze it's very common there. While
>I'm not quite ready for it I have a friend who is there quite a bit and he
>recently told me about it. Basically though all his group does is sell it
to
>a vendor so I imagine other groups may do this after they've been there
long
>enough. You may be able to head there and auction about it one thing is
